entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.9.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

  • fix: connect build process to the environment network by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/447

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.9.0...v1.9.1

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.9.2

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • feat: terminal to services by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/453
  • chore: add telemetry, reduce image size by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/454
  • feat: Terminal to servers by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/457

Others

  • ‚ôªÔ∏è use slim Dockerfile for production builds too by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/455

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.9.2...v1.10.0

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • feat: cleanup deployment queue by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/462
  • feat: cleanup the queue on a new deployment by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/465
  • feat: private github repositories via github apps by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/466
  • feat: private repositories via gitlab by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/471
  • feat: auto-deploy on github push by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/473
  • feat: GitLab auto-deploy by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/478

Other changes

  • chore: add 409 response serializer to env API by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/460
  • refactor: moving stuff around by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/461
  • fix: onboarding bug missing csrf header by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/472
  • fix: Custom Gitlab URL not set correctly by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/475
  • GitLab: Include all user-associated repositories, not only user-created ones by @AhmedBaset in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/476
  • fix: use the correct path for the venv in the Makefile by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/479
  • fix: resolve the branch name correctly in the auto-deploy webhook by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/480
  • chore: Use API for getting single tag for the auto-update API by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/481
  • feat: allow specifying a redirect URI when creating github app by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/482
  • chore: make button labels more accurate by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/483
  • chore: change the order of links in new service page by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/484
  • refactor: reorder links again ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/485
  • chore: some UI refactors by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/486
  • chore: fill slug if empty by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/487
  • fix: Some fixes by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/488

New Contributors

  • @AhmedBaset made their first contribution in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/476

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.10.0...v1.11.0
